description: Notification to signal switchover/failover.

event.Summary: Cluster $v2 switched over to $v5 state due to $v6

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChassisClusterSwitchover JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoRedundancyGroup s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoClusterId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoNodeId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoPreviousState s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoCurrentState s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoReason s EXAMPLE

description: This object contains identification of redundancy group
that switched over.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoRedundancyGroup

description: This object contains cluster identification information
where the switchover occured.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoClusterId

description: This object contains node identification information
where the switchover occured.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoNodeId

description: This object contains the redundancy state of the cluster
before the occurance of switchover.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoPreviousState

description: This object contains the redundancy state of the cluster
after the occurance of switchover.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoCurrentState

description: This object contains the cause for switchover.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoReason

description: Notification to signal node health status change (healthy/unhealthy).
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfTrap JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoClusterId s UPDOWN_TEST JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfState s DOWN JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfSeverity s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfStateReason s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfTrap JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoClusterId s UPDOWN_TEST JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfState s UP JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfSeverity s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfStateReason s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfTrap JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoClusterId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfState s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfSeverity s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfStateReason s EXAMPLE

description: This object contains cluster identification information
where the switchover occured.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSwitchoverInfoClusterId

description: This object contains the name of the link
that changed its state.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfName

description: This object contains the state of the link;
whether it is UP or DOWN.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfState

description: This object reflects the severity;
whether it is minor or major.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfSeverity

description: This object contains the reason why the link state
changed.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterIntfStateReason

description: Notification to signal cluster having different SPU number.

event.Summary: Cluster SPU mismatch: Local node: $v2; Remote node: $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterSpuMismatchTrap JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeZeroId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeZeroSpuCount s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeOneId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeOneSpuCount s EXAMPLE

description: This object contains remote node identification information
where the event occured.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeZeroId

description: This object contains local node total SPU number.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeZeroSpuCount

description: This object contains remote node identification information
where the event occured.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeOneId

description: This object contains remote node total SPU number.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeOneSpuCount

description: Notification to signal node health status change (healthy/unhealthy).
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterWeightTrap JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterClusterID s HealthyUnhealthy_TEST JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterRedundancyGroupID s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeID s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterWeightHealthStatus s unhealthy JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterWeightValue s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterWeightTrap JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterClusterID s HealthyUnhealthy_TEST JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterRedundancyGroupID s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeID s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterWeightHealthStatus s healthy JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterWeightValue s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterWeightTrap JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterClusterID s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterRedundancyGroupID s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeID s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterWeightHealthStatus s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterWeightValue s EXAMPLE

description: This object contains identification of cluster
in which the event occured.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterClusterID

description: This object contains identification of RedundancyGroup
in which the event occured.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterRedundancyGroupID

description: This object contains identification of node
in which the event occured.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterNodeID

description: This object contains health status, whether is healthy
or unhealthy.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterWeightHealthStatus

description: This object contains weight value.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterWeightValue

description: Notification to signal cluster is in unhealth status.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthTrap JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthNodeID s SEVERITY_TEST JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthSeverity s major JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthReason s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthTrap JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthNodeID s SEVERITY_TEST JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthSeverity s minor JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthReason s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthTrap JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthNodeID s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthSeverity s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthReason s EXAMPLE

description: This object contains identification of node
in which the event occured.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthNodeID

description: This object reflects the severity;
whether it is minor or major.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthSeverity

description: This object contains ha unhealth status reason.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CHASSIS-CLUSTER-MIB::jnxJsChClusterHealthReason
